name: Synchronicity (simulacrum_games, insideoutgames)
description:
This game was created for the Epic MegaJam 2022 with the theme of "As Above, So Below".

The beasts from below are coming for your people!
Keep your population alive for as long as possible in this strategic tower defense game. Choose carefully, as with each deployment of your defenses above comes a sacrifice which only serves to bolster the beasts below.

Gameplay Instructions: 

LEFT-CLICK to select.
RIGHT-CLICK  and drag to rotate the planet.
SCROLL the mouse wheel to zoom in and out.
MOUSE OVER objects to see more gameplay tips!

Select one card, select a second card, then select a map location.

The FIRST card will create the "ABOVE" effect at the chosen location.

The SECOND card will create the "BELOW" effect at the same location, but mirrored across the equator.

You CANNOT play cards exactly at the equator!

Your hand will be refreshed every day.
